info.name: routeEcommerce production
info.description: this documents the production version of the routeEcommerce project

item.name: AuthEndPOINTS

request.description: token generation for the forgot password endpoint
user login to the app endpoint

item.description: this module handles the auth routes needed for my app to be secure

item.name: ProductENDPOINTS

formdata.value: A premium leather wallet that offers a perfect blend of style and functionality. This wallet is designed with multiple compartments to keep your cards, cash, and coins organized. The material is durable and gives a luxurious feel, making it an ideal gift for yourself or a loved one

item.description: Handles all product-related operations, including the creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of product listings. This module ensures that product information is accurately maintained and available for users to browse and purchase.

item.name: AddressesENDPOINTS

request.description: gets the logged in user addresses as descriped
updates an address for the logged in user
remove an address for the logged in user
adds an address to the logged in user

item.description: Manages the storage and retrieval of user addresses. This module allows users to add, update, and select multiple shipping and billing addresses, ensuring that orders are delivered to the correct address.

item.name: WishlistENDPOINTS

request.description: gets the logged in user wishlist of listed products
removes a product from the wishlist of the logged in user with the product id
adds a product to the wishlist of the logged in user with the product id

item.description: Enables users to create and manage wishlists, allowing them to save products they are interested in for future reference or purchase. This module enhances the user experience by providing a personalized shopping list.

item.name: OrderENDPOINTS

request.description: gets the logged in user orders
gets an order by order id from the logged in user orders
update the order address for the user
update the order status from an admin account
removes a spicific order for for the logged in user
creates a cash on delivery order for the enduser
creates an online payment order though stripe gateway with the cart id in params

item.description: Manages the entire order lifecycle, from order creation to fulfillment. It tracks order statuses, processes payments, and ensures that orders are accurately recorded and managed throughout the purchasing process.

item.name: CartENDPOINTS

request.description: gets the logged in user's cart
updates the item quantity for the item you added to your cart
removes an item from your cart
creates the cart with a simple product id in the body and handles price calculations

item.description: Manages the user's shopping cart, enabling users to add, update, and remove products they intend to purchase. It ensures that the cart persists across user sessions and accurately reflects the selected items and quantities.

item.name: CouponENDPOINTS

request.description: apply the coupon by the code in params to the logged in user cart

item.description:
handles coupon creation and retrieval and applying that coupon to a specific cart  
all routes are admin specific routes besides apply to the cart

item.name: ReviewENDPOINTS

request.description: updates the commentt and rating for a review by id for the logged in user
delete a review by id for the logged in user
creates a review for a specific product

item.description: Facilitates the collection and management of user reviews and ratings for products. This module allows users to provide feedback on their purchases, helping other customers make informed decisions and providing valuable insights for product improvements.

item.name: BrandENDPOINTS
item.description: Manages the different brands associated with products on the platform. This module handles the creation, updating, and organization of brand information, enabling users to filter and search products based on their preferred brands.

item.name: SubCategoryENDPOINTS

request.description: get subcategories of a category by category id

item.description: Further refines product organization by categorizing products into subcategories under main categories. This module ensures a hierarchical structure, allowing for more detailed and specific product classification for enhanced user navigation.

item.name: CategoryENDPOINTS
item.description: Organizes products into various categories, making it easier for users to navigate and find products of interest. This module manages the creation, updating, and deletion of product categories to maintain a well-structured product catalog.

item.name: UserENDPOINTS

request.description: update the logged in user information
change the password for the logged in user

item.description: Handles user management including profile managementThis module ensures that users can retrieve or update thier users
